CancelStatement.name: CancelStatement
CancelStatement.description: Grants permission to cancel a running query

DescribeStatement.name: DescribeStatement
DescribeStatement.description: Grants permission to retrieve detailed information about a statement execution

DescribeTable.name: DescribeTable
DescribeTable.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata about a particular table

ExecuteStatement.name: ExecuteStatement
ExecuteStatement.description: Grants permission to execute a query

GetStatementResult.name: GetStatementResult
GetStatementResult.description: Grants permission to fetch the result of a query

ListDatabases.name: ListDatabases
ListDatabases.description: Grants permission to list databases for a given cluster

ListSchemas.name: ListSchemas
ListSchemas.description: Grants permission to list schemas for a given cluster

ListStatements.name: ListStatements
ListStatements.description: Grants permission to list queries for a given principal

ListTables.name: ListTables
ListTables.description: Grants permission to list tables for a given cluster
